Class Replay

  • java.lang.Object
    • Replay

  • public class Replay
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Neang Thomas and Bruit Gabriel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Replay(java.lang.String name)
      Construct the object that will load the game.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadBoard(Board board)
      Set the two first value of the board with the two next Value in the file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Replay

        public Replay(java.lang.String name)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Construct the object that will load the game.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file to load.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file doesn't exist.

    • Method Detail

      • loadBoard

        public void loadBoard(Board board)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Set the two first value of the board with the two next Value in the file. This method must be called first just after the creation of the board and before starting to read in the file.
        Parameters:
        board - The board to modify.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the reading fail.

      • loadEvent

        public boolean loadEvent(Board board,
                         Event event)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Set the next value in the board and give the direction to do in event. Be careful with the format of file, the loading stop directly at the first error.
        Parameters:
        board - The board to modify.
        event - The event used to move the board.
        Returns:
        A boolean return true if an event is load false when it finish.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the reading fail.
